original_text: And they understood none of these things: and this saying was hid from them, neither knew they the things which were spoken.
korean_text: 제자들이 이것을 하나도 깨닫지 못하였으니 그 말씀이 감취었으므로 그들이 그 이르신 바를 알지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: And they understood none of these things
and this saying was hid from them
